bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, compact design, internal cable routing, integrated headset, fender/rack eyelets, center kickstand plate, eccentric BB adjuster

components.description: Aluminum legs/crown, Cr-Mo steerer, 52mm fully integrated headset, fender/rack eyelets, internal light cable routing
1-1/8" sealed Cr-Mo bearings integrated w/ headset, 15mm alloy cone spacer with 25mm of spacers
Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp

Body Geometry Targa, lock on for bar ends

50T Gates Centertrack belt drive chainring
GXP, external bearing
Sirrus pedal, nylon body, symmetric alloy cage, low profile bearing system, toe clip capable
DRX300 Disc, alloy double-wall, sleeved, CNC machined, 32h
Supernova Infinity 8 dynamo hub, Freespin technology, switchable drag, QR

Stainless, 2mm
